about_the_game:
In this game, you will play as a faction leader, starting from scratch and developing from a small fleet with only a few broken ships into a powerful super empire that shakes the world. To achieve this goal, you can transform into a strategist, win over some factions to attack others, and use your superb diplomatic skills to betray your allies while making them grateful to you; Alternatively, you can become a legendary figure, with both the enemy and the enemy at your disposal. You can use your art of war command to ravage your opponents, plunder their wealth, and force them to become your subjects. As long as someone dares to oppose you, all that awaits them is a flash of dust and smoke; It's also good to be a wealthy and ruthless businessman, monopolizing the supply of goods, controlling logistics, speculating and hoarding. Continuously accumulating a large amount of wealth, using money to buy people's hearts, tempting enemies to die for you, in short, any problem that can be solved with money is no longer a problem for you.
If you are tired of the conflicts in the world and only think about the peaceful passage of time, then take a down-to-earth approach to attracting and cultivating talents, revitalizing the industrial system, improving social security, and encouraging scientific research to reward military achievements. Use your wisdom and patience to nurture your unique cause bit by bit. As long as you work hard and follow the right path in the world, there will naturally be subordinates to escort you and great scholars to argue for you.


Features:
Multiple ways to achieve victory. This includes completing mission objectives, competing for profit-earning points, defeating other factions, and more.


Build a mini-industrial system, including energy extraction, agricultural production, metal smelting, chemical synthesis, food processing and other projects.


Operate a mini-market economy, including a dual logistics network inside and outside the faction, to balance the supply and demand of commodities to stabilize prices and maximize income.


Automatic turns, freed from frequent operations, only notifies you when you need to intervene.


Explore the vast universe. Discover new colonies, encounter events, and acquire treasures.


Command fleets in real-time battles that can be paused at any time.


The developers describe how their game uses AI Generated Content like this:
To better focus on the core design of the game, some of our portraits and scene, were produced through a process involving drafts by artists, AI-assisted rendering, and adjustments by artists. Moreover, to ensure the final artistic presentation, all AI-generated assets have been manually refined by the artists.
detailed_description:
In this game, you will play as a faction leader, starting from scratch and developing from a small fleet with only a few broken ships into a powerful super empire that shakes the world. To achieve this goal, you can transform into a strategist, win over some factions to attack others, and use your superb diplomatic skills to betray your allies while making them grateful to you; Alternatively, you can become a legendary figure, with both the enemy and the enemy at your disposal. You can use your art of war command to ravage your opponents, plunder their wealth, and force them to become your subjects. As long as someone dares to oppose you, all that awaits them is a flash of dust and smoke; It's also good to be a wealthy and ruthless businessman, monopolizing the supply of goods, controlling logistics, speculating and hoarding. Continuously accumulating a large amount of wealth, using money to buy people's hearts, tempting enemies to die for you, in short, any problem that can be solved with money is no longer a problem for you.
If you are tired of the conflicts in the world and only think about the peaceful passage of time, then take a down-to-earth approach to attracting and cultivating talents, revitalizing the industrial system, improving social security, and encouraging scientific research to reward military achievements. Use your wisdom and patience to nurture your unique cause bit by bit. As long as you work hard and follow the right path in the world, there will naturally be subordinates to escort you and great scholars to argue for you.


Features:
Multiple ways to achieve victory. This includes completing mission objectives, competing for profit-earning points, defeating other factions, and more.


Build a mini-industrial system, including energy extraction, agricultural production, metal smelting, chemical synthesis, food processing and other projects.


Operate a mini-market economy, including a dual logistics network inside and outside the faction, to balance the supply and demand of commodities to stabilize prices and maximize income.


Automatic turns, freed from frequent operations, only notifies you when you need to intervene.


Explore the vast universe. Discover new colonies, encounter events, and acquire treasures.

The developers describe how their game uses AI Generated Content like this:
To better focus on the core design of the game, some of our portraits and scene, were produced through a process involving drafts by artists, AI-assisted rendering, and adjustments by artists. Moreover, to ensure the final artistic presentation, all AI-generated assets have been manually refined by the artists.

name: Uncharted Space - project 3062

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel core i3 540
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 370X
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX580
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible sound card

short_description: In this game, you are a leader, leading a force of army to fight other forces in the deep spaces. You will plunder their resources, build your homelands, explore and expand, managing your army both strategically and tactically. This will be a saga written with blood and fire.
